summary: This is a US Marshals Service prisoner schedule report from the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn, dated August 9, 2019. It lists two prisoners being transported for court proceedings and medical transport, along with separatee warnings indicating other inmates they must be kept apart from.

persons.name: Jonathan Espinal

events.title: Prisoner Transport for Hospital and Sentencing
events.description: Jonathan Espinal was scheduled for hospital transport, and Henry Rodriguez was scheduled for sentencing at 40 Foley (likely a courthouse), both from Brooklyn MDC.

locations: 40 Foley (likely 40 Foley Square, a courthouse in Manhattan)
keyFacts: This document is a routine US Marshals prisoner schedule from August 9, 2019, showing transport of inmates from Brooklyn MDC.
The document lists 'separatee warnings' for multiple inmates, indicating security protocols to keep certain prisoners apart.
None of the individuals listed appear to be directly connected to Jeffrey Epstein or his case; this appears to be general prison administration documentation.
The document reference EFTA00058673 suggests it was included in Epstein-related document releases, possibly for contextual or administrative reasons.
